page.title: 08Hartford Works
page.content: The area near Hartford Works is a lively, bustling place. There is a large industrial estate which includes Ferranti, Wastedrive, Dews and Hartford Works itself. Housing estates are present, tower blocks and bungalows. The bungalows are ideal for elderly people. The housing estates are hunting grounds for first time buyers. Commercial and busy, Ferranti stands prominent across the old railway bridge leading to Manchester Road. Standing behind is Wastedrive. Lorries collecting scrap take it here to be recycled. Opposite Wastedrive is Dews which does industrial landscaping for large businesses. Pubs, Hotels, Bars and Inns are around every corner.
